values: For those that dont know this already I have a new journal....user name: xxhitmandanxx...but only people that are in my friends list will be able to view it...I will no longer be updating this but will still check in on it for recent posts and respond to them...and if you want to view my new journal and I forgot to add you make a comment here...I will decide if I want you to view it.
I am hanging out with my good friends!

And another thing...I am not going to work my ass off to care for someone and make them the most important thing to me in the world for nothing...to just be regarded as another person...to not feel good in return...and honestly I can say it was a now or never situation...and the decision was made...and it makes me feel like shit...it does...but...it pisses me off...and instead of flipping on some people...I will just distance myself from the world that says to much and does to little about things...because is exactly what this world is...a world of people who talk about love and being loved...but in the end what do they do about it...they let you be alone and cry...and not support you that is what the world does...and I hate it...and I hate when I am like that...I hate me...honestly if Dan ever met another Dan....it would be the death of Dan...that may be hard to understand but that is how it is...and I am fighting myself constantly...constantly confused...constantly looking...for what I am not to sure...but I am looking for it...and it hasn't came...and the longer I go searching for this...I get some false security that it will be what solves all my problems...and maybe it will...but it most likely wont...:/
well heh I slept to much today and kinda miss school...no big loss....meh I am feeling ok...maybe it is better that I stayed home because some people really pissed me off...anyways bye bye
well I stayed home today...and I don't think I was supposed too O_O!...Happy Birthday!

I had a pretty good day...Jaci came over and t'was fun...she got to see the embarassing pictures of me...THANKS MOM...:/...well I had a kick ass day and hope I can have more of em! <3 y'allz....NO ONE DO ANYTHING TO BRING ME DOWN!

Fuck the world...fuck people...and especially...fuck you...I am tired of this world and its people and their fucking ignorance...people do not understand what is going on until they are too old to do something about it...and it is just...open your fucking eyes to what is there and see what is going on...don't shield your eyes with your stupidity...there is so much more going on...people think they are just living it up in there young days...ugh...It is going to be a harsh reality for some people once they hit about 20-25....when the REAL things start happening...not all this drama bullshit...not this bullshit where you get to choose between who likes you...no its where you have to choose someone that isn't going to rape you or play you like a little bitch...it only goes downhill....and people are living like they will always be on top....sorry  if I am not being my cheery self...I am pissed off about some things.

Unfortunate
damn
damn these feelings
that I cannot feel
and these dreams
that are not real
if only I could live that day
over and over
have it not
fade away
I fucking loved you
in every way
and while here I stay
you just fucking
walked away
and now to you
I have nothing to say
everything
just fades away
there was nothing
I could say
your mind was made
the thoughts they stay
the choice was yours
and you went that way
and chose the other
and now, never
will we find each other
I will just find another
and hopefully
we'll love each other
the love
we couldn't have
which I think
is just to bad
losing all
we might of had
it tears me up
and spits me out
it will be hard
to live without
you beside me
and in my heart
but I feel
it's time we part

written by Daniel Shane Anderson...bla bla bla

Daily Overview
March 4, 2004

Yesterday it was still clear, but now everything is a mess. The guilty are punished, but not before they drag many others down with them. It's hard to imagine a fresh start after this, but nothing else will work.

wow...can it get any closer to what is really going on.

well I got my license today...woo hoo...hung out with dani, eric, and shawn....t'was fun...I was supposed to hang out with someone else today but I guess they don't want to hang out with me :/...

The Way I Feel
you
how do you
do what you do
you are my drug
you're my nicotine
yes
what I feel is a bit obscene
but still sane
I am put through so much pain
and through it all no personal gain
but just one wish
I want you to be my queen
yes it is obscene
far from the truth
not a reality
but yet I still hope
for this dream
choices being made
that are my heaven or hell
I wish you well
I really do
all I want
is tobe with you
with you here
I wont fear
that lonely darkness
that creeps near
I love you so
but sometimes I just don't know
if it is the way to go
all the things you do
make me fall in love with you
oh how I want to be with you
make you feel so good
if I could
you know I would
you might not know what you had
until what you had is gone
and I hope it doesn't end this way
but sometimes it's just the price to pay
for the choices that we make
you just might be making a mistake
knowing what you have is fake
these stupid risks you sometimes take
and when it's all said and done
I might not still love you hun

comment on what you think about it or suggestions...I know it is probably ruggish but that is because it is my rough draft and hasn't been revised....and for legal rights....this is written by Daniel S. Anderson...hehe that looks so stupid :p
I would feel for you...if you would just feel the same.

I don't know...fuck this place...I am just so tired of fucking emotions...they don't want to work out in anyone's favor...I am liking people that don't like me back...people liking me that aren't going to get those feelings back most likely...fucking...damnit sometimes I don't know why whoever is doing this plays these kinds of games...is there some superior thing that likes to toy with us? are we just living out some child's game...some child's imagination...or we a little part in something so much more...something so huge it is inconceivable...I honestly don't know and I cannot tell you the answer...I can only give you more questions to  doubt in this place called home...in this frame of mind also known as life...people living there lives thinking about themselves...and not thinking outside of this box called "life"...not thinking about the so much more...what is going on...what are we....all pawns to someones game?...If only I knew...if only.

"...Little Suzy
She was only twelve
She was given the world
With every chance to excel

Hang with the boys and
Hear the stories they tell
She might act kind of proud
But no respect for herself

She finds love in
All the wrong places
The same situations
Just different faces

Changed up her pace
Since her daddy left her
Too bad he never told her
She deserved much better

Johnny boy
Always played the fool
He broke all the rules
So you would
Think he was cool

He was never
Really one of the guys
No matter
How hard he tried
Often thought of suicide

It's kind of hard when
You ain't got no friends
He put his life to an end
They might remember him then...." - P.O.D. - Youth of the Nation

Here are a few of my new songs...written by me...Daniel S. Anderson...and are NOT directed towards any one in peticular...you know who you are that might think this...however much they seem like they are.

Times of Change
thinking your so special
just ripping me apart
going about your day
my heart slowly fades away
living life so blind
not knowing which way to take
always making a mistake
its unvailing so damn fast
reminding of my past
I grow so callous
no longer I can feel
that I've felt before
I'm just a stupid whore
pounding at your front door
but expecting not a glance
this is your only chance
before I walk away
and here alone
you will stay
tired of all the shit
I take another hit
and then fall to the ground
I will be your whore no more
now I am feeling so damn free
now I'm living life
the way it's meant to be
no longer am I confused
no longer I feel used
I am free of my cage
these are times of change

Regrets
thinking
thinking you relate
you only bring me hate
tell me in my ear
all the things that you fear
shaping you to my mold
letting you unfold
but still keeping you controled
you think your doing fine
but I'm still eating at your mind
with your fears I still control you
I loved you so much
but still you pushed me aside
not knowing what you had
until it was gone
I am just done
with all of this shit
I crawl out of this pit
of my depression
this is a confession
meant just for you
I am tired of all the things I do
everything was just for you
and none of it matters
you don't even care
not willing to share
the feelings I had for you
all the things you do
is why I fell for you
but this fall
ended up breaking
so much more than just my heart
my whole world just fell apart
and now
not knowing where to start
I feel so damn stranded
and branded
on my head
the regrets of what I said
what I felt
what I should of done instead....
ugh...I don't know...whatever I guess...I get my driver's test on wedsnday woo hoo! <3 y'allz

I do not want to see your "parts" ever...nothing you can do make me want to...I will look away...and most people are probably going to read this and be like WHAT THE HELL?...but for who it is directed too....I do not ever want to and you will never see mine...and that is final.
ack it is hard being this damn man-pretty...and it is hard smelling so damn good all the time....yeesh. :D <3

WOW what a crazy day yesterday...thinking is a very very bad thing...it leads to sadness and hatred...it leads to pain and confusion...there should not be thinking just instinct's...like animals...do you ever see animals sad...hell no...animals do not cry...animals do not commit suicide...animals are good...lets be animals...I want to be...a bunny! YAHH!!!
megan if you read this I am sorry I wasn't on AIM some shit happened and long story short my mom got arrested...I wont be in school tomorrow but I will hopefully talk to you tomorrow!
eh same day as usual pretty much...anyways....<3 y'allz!

I try so hard just to fail again...It always sucks to have to go against everything you feel, gather your losses, and continue ahead blind...it's very hard...I liked you so much...and when it would be best if I didn't...I find out you want me to like you...and for what...so you can just feel special...you like how I make you feel and the idea that I like you more than you will ever like me in return...and that is a hard reality for me to have to deal with....so...I must decide what is more important to me...myself....or you....and for most people this is a simple choice...but it is not for me....because I don't feel very great about myself...and I feel so much towards you...and it is going to be tough to have to just drop everything....and I can gaurantee it will not be a fun experience...I don't know why I am always doing this...always liking someone...and I always just end up feeling like shit

well I stayed home today...slept till about 12 then took a shower and shaved my head again...then shaved my beard....took a shower and got all clean...did the teeth all nice and minty like...then I put on my acne cream...then the lotion to counteract the driness of the acne cream...and I put cologne all over my clothes so I smell all good and shit and basically am mentally and physically starting over again...if you can understand what I mean...bye

well that was fun, my happiness lasted for about hmmmmm 1 day, I mean I am not as sad as I was just dissappointed that things had to end this way...I don't really have much to say if you have questions I guess you can ask me about them....bye

I had an awesome day today...I feel so much better...went to the garage...it was so fun...some kid was talking crap and I hit him in the face it felt so good to get something out...and very unlike me I kissed someone...it was really odd...some random girls were all together and asked for hugs from me...then one of em asked for a kiss so I kissed her on the cheek...then she said no on my lips...and I did...people that know me know I am not normally like that...it was really odd...but somehow actually made me feel better...it wasn't like sensual or something...but it did seem nice...but I also felt like I was doing something wrong...I don't know but I will let you guys and gals comment on it...just so you know I'm feeling alot better now...felt good to hang out with my good friends again...It is just a matter of time until something brings me down again though...lets just hope it's not to soon. :/...bye

I just can't take it anymore...thoughts of suicide are just overwhelming...I'm just so scared and confused...I would go to the fucking ends of the world for some people...and for what?...to end up in tears almost every night because of it...it is like I guess I care to much for people...because I give a damn...and want them to be happy and feel terrific and special...feel like someone really honestly cares for them...I care so fucking much...and it doesn't make a fucking difference I just keep getting fucked over in life...and when I hear oh something might work out...well damn...IT FUCKING DOESN'T...I just want an easy answer to all my fucking problems...sure I would be taking the "woosie" way out...but honestly I don't give a shit...I'm more of a fucking woosie for expressing my fucking feelings...I should just fucking not talk to anyone and live a life knowing I am just going to not be able to find someone that I love that loves me fucking back...I just wont...I could easily have a girlfriend...but no I want the one that is special...but the ones that are special to me...the ones that I want to possibly something more than a friend....are closer with people that they have never even fucking met before more than me...I guess I care to fucking much...want people to be happy to fucking much and it doesn't even fucking matter...it just all gets fucking blown out like it never makes a difference...I have already given up so much...I just completely stopped hanging out with my friends just for you...became friends with your friends so I would fit it...and it just blows away like dust in the wind...doesn't even matter...doesn't make even a slight change of heart...and it is overwhelming me to the point where I am not going to take it anymore...I can't...I guess im sorry for caring to much...I am scared to use the word love anymore because it always leads to fear for them...they always want to just completely back off when feelings get to strong...I guess because I don't want sex and I don't want to be like that...so I guess that makes me not adequate for anyone...I guess because I'm not a fucking perverted boy and that I care how people's live's are going and am interested in how you are feeling I am not a good person...I'm sorry I'm not good enough for those who I like...I guess I just pick the wrong people...people say there would people hurt if I did something as absurd as that...but you know what...people would slowly forget about me...just like people tell me to do now...to forget about it and move along...well that would be a much faster way to forget...and then they would just have to forget about me...like everyone does anyway...I am of no significance...if I die the world would not end...people might be in sorrow for a bit...but they would get over it...I haven't made a difference in anyone's life...at least not enough for them to even turn their cheek...to even try...that is all I have to say for now...and just because I say i'll write later doesn't mean I wouldn't take that road as an option...I already have tried before...and I don't really have anyone that really cares about me...the person that cares most about me is a 4 year old that is my little brother...and that is probably one of the only reasons I am still here today.
had a pretty fun day today...hung out with jaci and b-jon for a while...was some good stuff.....ooo the writing is so spoooooky...ooo beware the spooooooky writing :p... <3 y'allz
just another day...nothing sets it apart from the rest.

i feel awful...like i could just throw up...and die...and just explode all at once...and it is annoying....ugh i dont know i just feel awful...stomach hurts...head hurts...heart hurts....and im not even sick...i dont know...talk to whoever later.

hmmm....I don't know....I really don't have much to say right now...I'm feeling kind of blah...can't really explain it...I feel sick in a way even though I'm not...just feeling an all around...not good...not normal sadness just...a feeling a not comfortable with self...and I just don't know....sorry to those who come to this for there only source of entertainment!!! i have nothing to really say at this moment.

well today im just feeling all around shitty....I can't wait to find that one person for me....i hope it is soon...i find the person that makes me feel so happy when there around and i make them feel very happy....and we can spend hours together....and not be tired of it....i want that so bad....i hope i find the one....

just saying this to put something in here.....ugh...i got alot of hugs today from people and had people comfort me...that helped....i just wish life was easy....wish people would walk around with tags of who they liked....then you could find someone that has there name on your tag and your name on there tag....and all problems would be solved!.....well ok that would probably make more problems but i hope you people get my drift....yea....and you...you know who you are....i wish you the best of luck...i hope you are able to sort everything out....and noell thanks for the comfort....u 2 mamie :D.....now i just need to find out what to do with this god damn teddy bear.....

"Now I see the times they changed...Leaving doesn't seem so strange...I am hoping I can find...Where to leave my hurt behind...All the shit I seem to take...All alone I seem to break...I have lived the best I can...Does this make me not a man?" KoRn - Alone I Break.

ugh....sometimes i wish i was just....non-existant....ugh fuck....today is no where near yesterday....yesterday was perfect.....today is hell....i just want to crawl in a corner and cry myself to a never-ending sleep...i....ugh.....just cant really take this anymore....fuck.....i keep losing the fucking greatest things in my life...and soon i will have nothing to live for....and....i let my anger get the best of me and flipped on someone on the bus....i wouldnt of stopped if i started to hit that kid....sometimes i scare myself....i hate myself...."i cannot save you, i can't even save myself, so just save yourself."

I had one of the BEST days of my life today....it was awesome....sure i got yelled at for skipping 3rd hour and got yelled at because my honors pre-calc teacher called cuz i havent been doing my homework....i read a little something that kinda made me sad....but i had a great time none the less.....ugh i just wish i could have more days like today....it was just friggin awesome...that is about all i have to say for now im looking forward to a kick ass day at the zoo tomorrow!!! i <3 y'allz!!! and another <3 for you!!!!......have a great night everyone!!
EVERY-FUCKING-BODY IS GETTING A HUG TOMORROW.....GOOD DAY TO YOU!!!!.....<3 y'allz!

awesome...just got back from my second day of exercising and it feels great....i cant wait to keep it up and become a lean mean sexy machine :p....im gonna stop drinking pop and am not gonna eat more than 1000 calories a day...told my mom to get some banana's and apples in this damn house....instead of chips and pizza rolls :p...im hoping i will be alot better looking by the end of february and hope i can get my bench press max to about 180-200 max by the end of the school year..<3 y'allz

after a long night of trying to sleep......thinking about things.....i had to wake up this morning and do drivers ed again.....so i will probably have my license in like a week or two so im feeling good about that.....although im gonna have to get a job....ugh....i have decided that i will be running every day and lifting and doing other exercises to get even more man-pretty....:p....im hoping in like 2 weeks i will weigh around 150-160.....if i keep on track it shouldnt be too hard to do.....yea.....well that is about all i have to say for now....<3 'allz

well.....after i had my long nap from being up at 8 am for behind the wheel....i realize....i am in some deep shit.....i am falling for someone....once again.....that most likely wont work out at all.....and it is gonna hurt....and just ugh i have a bad feeling about it....i was sleeping and had some horrible dreams i dont really want to discuss with everyone...and they were just very hurtful....and just made me feel like complete shit after i had those dreams....fuck.....i just hope things end up all right....cuz if they dont i dont know how much more of it i can take....i just....hope it doesn't end up in pain...i already know one person that would not want to see it happen...they dont even know me....but i can gaurantee that it would be bad for them if it did happen.that is all i have to say for now.....

well i had a pretty kick ass day.....after school i went to jaci's and then we played nintendo and talked about some stuff.....we went to jefferson and watched the wrestling matches......we lost :(.....then we walked around for a while and watched some people dance in dresses and stuff....:p....before we left we had a talk about some stuff and i hope we can continue the conversation on a later date......that is about all i have to say for now...got behind the wheel at 8am.....woo hoo how awesome.....well <3 y'all.....your a great person!!!.....don't let anyone or anything make you feel otherwise....don't feel like no one likes you sometimes.....your great :D.....i like you alot!!!!

had a pretty good day today.....kinda sucks i didnt get to talk to some people as much as i wanted to but meh what can i do...feeling relatively happy so yea :D....dont have much to say today....hey girl your so fine your so fine you blow my mind.....you know who you are :p....lol....well yea if you want to talk about anything just msg me!!!!....looking forward to a kick ass weekend.....jaci is gonna get her ass kicked in nintendo O_O!.....hehe....<3 y'allz!

i swear to god....if you are messing with me.....all will see a new me.....they will see an angry uncontrolled beast that will tear down anything in his way that stops him.....they will come across hell.....the hell that is me....i will go down in glory....i will not go down as a person that was chewed up and spit out....i will keep my chin up even when i am past dead......i will bite down and bare through it all....i will not be taken as a fool....i will not be taken as some toy....that can be used and played with....and discarded when you get tired of it...i will not allow myself to become that....i know what words i am using.....i am not ignorant to the truth....i am wise on what is going on...i am omniscent....i am omnipotent....i know when i am being two-faced.....i know when i am making people believe they are two-facing me...i know what dirty tricks people are up to....and i know when i am using dirty tricks to my advantage...i know it is not right when i do....i know what is right and what is wrong....i know more than i appear to know....i am good with words....i can make people feel better...or i can break them with my words....i can torment with my words....but out of the same lips may come healing to those who are deserving....i can be there for those who need me....i can be there for those who dont.....i can be scary.....i can be wierd....i can be caring and sweet.....i can be cute....i can be ugly....i can be evil and dirty....i can be nice and clean....i can play your little games.....i can make you play mine.....i can make you understand....i can confuse you.....i can make you feel like a god/godess....i can make you feel like the scum of the earth.....i can hurt you....i can love you.....i can hate you....i can just downright ignore you......but what it all comes down to.....is what you are able to do as a person about it.....and that....is what makes some great....makes some hero's....your choices in life make you....some will make smart choices....some will make stupid choices......but....the one thing that matters after considering all this.....is that....YOU ARE GREAT...and not to let anyone or anything make you think otherwise...<3 y'allz

as it is almost 6 am i am feeling a little bit more crazy....a little bit....off the edge.....more like an animal really...maybe it is the korn i am listening to me bringing back memories of 7th and 8th grade.....getting so messed up.......its tormenting me....i want it so bad....i can taste it.....its right there in front of me....and i will get it....feeling a little out of the norm....feeling....out of me....not good ol' dan....feeling maybe a bit....evil....i dont know what it is.....but something is driving me crazy.....something i want.....something i NEED....i dont know what.....but i will soon enough i feel....it torments me when i sleep.....wakes me in a cold sweat....slowly tearing me away....down to the bone.....im not feeling normal.....not at all....it is taking me....the urge.....the.....dark....ooo....i dont want to....but it is to god damn tempting.....Why do i have a conscience? All it does is fuck with me Why do i have this torment? All i wanna do is fuck it away - korn.......feeling....on edge....a little unwell....we all are animals in a way.....and i think mine is trying to get out....i will supress it for as long as i can....but some things are making it come out.....ooooo.....yea....something....it plays with me....and if it wants to play....ill play....i like games.

thats it for now......
